titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain other single viscose rayon yarn.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/10/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on other yarn, single: of viscose rayon, untwisted or with a twist not exceeding 120 turns per meter except for medium tenacity rayon filament yarn (2.8 to 4.1 grains per denier) manufactured solely for the purpose of carbonizing.
